types.name: style
types.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
types.title: Styles

types.name: refactor
types.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
types.title: Code Refactoring

types.name: perf
types.description: A code change that improves performance
types.title: Performance Improvements

types.name: test
types.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
types.title: Tests

types.name: build
types.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)
types.title: Builds

types.name: ci
types.description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)
types.title: Continuous Integrations

types.name: chore
types.description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
types.title: Chores
